Our city

Hello, and welcome to Neon Heights. Here you will find all the premium (basic) necessities for you to live with hunger. There are a variety of shops that no longer have owners nor functioning water, and plenty of places for you to stand.


At Neon Heights, our goal is our satisfaction, and we hope you pick us as your next home.

The Plan

Phase 1: Downtown

[COMPLETED]

The residents at Neon Heights: Downtown are very satisfied and happy with their cobblestone wall. Many believe this wall is what keeps the rapists and murderers outside the city, but the truth is that "The wall keeps them contained inside and away from our other better looking districts" (Mayor Jeremy Chiaramonte).

The residents at this Suburban are extremely happy to be living in an area clear from pollution and city loudness. With the Sheep god blessing and watching over the city, this district will be the most sustainable and long lasting of all of Neon Height's districts.



 

Phase 3: Coastal City


(5/32/11) NOTICE: The city is currently beginning development. So we expect it will be completed and open by tomorrow.

There's nothing better than living at Neon Heights' Coastal City. Beautiful buildings and dense forests create the place we know and love. We have never had walls nor criminals at Neon Height's Coastal City.

Vist numerous amounts of tourist attractions, such as our Grade A McAfee-Secured Bed-Free Bedrock Jail. Here you will find Neon Height's worst criminals.

Take a break and visit the beach or take a tour in two of ISIS's best planes in the sky above. There are infinite possibilities here, but don't forget to complete your day by relaxing on one of our 5-Star benches tonight (first come first serve).

Order your supply of Octane from the local gas station to power up your horse, and grab a bite at the local Chipotle that will rip you off even after you struggle for an hour to find parking in the West Shopping Center next to the College.
